<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3122</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3122</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura. Les màscares</string>
            <string language="en">Literature. Masks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur. Schablonen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature. Masques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura. Máscaras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura. Mascherine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία. Μάσκες</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta del teatre, els seus inicis, la seva evolució i els gèneres dramàtics principals. S'hi estudia el teatre a Grècia i Roma, el Renaixement -Commedia dell'Arte- i els gèneres més importants: tragèdia, drama i comèdia. Textos d'Aristòfanes -La pau- i de Racine -Fedra-. Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on the theatre, its beginnings, development and main genres, including Greek and Roman plays, the Renaissance "Commedia dell'Arte"; and the main genres: tragedy, drama, and comedy. Sample texts from Aristophanes' "Peace" and Racine's "Phèdre". Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">arts escèniques</string>
            <string language="en">performing arts</string>
            <string language="es">artes escénicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf dem Theater, seine 
Anfänge, Entwicklung und Hauptgenren, einschließlich die 
griechischen und römischen Spiele, die Renaissance "Commedia 
dell'Arte"; und die Hauptgenren: Tragödie, Drama und 
Komödie. Beispieltexte von Aristophanes "Friedens-" und Racines
"Phèdre". Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten sind auch für Praxis 
eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive sur le théâtre, ses 
débuts, développement et genres principaux, y compris les jeux grecs
et romains, la Renaissance "dell'Arte de Commedia" ; et les 
genres principaux : tragédie, drame, et comédie. Textes 
témoin de Phèdre "de la" paix "et du Racine d'Aristophanes". 
Des activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses 
pour la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo no theatre, seu começos, 
desenvolvimento e genres principais, including os jogos gregos e 
roman, o renascimento de "dell'Arte Commedia"; e os genres 
principais: tragédia, drama, e comedy. Textos da amostra 
Phèdre "da" paz "e do Racine de Aristophanes' de". As 
atividades do self-assessment são incluídas também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva sul teatro, i relativo 
inizii, sviluppo e generi principali, compreso i giochi greci e 
romani, la rinascita "dell'Arte di Commedia"; ed i generi 
principali: tragedia, dramma e commedia. Testi del 
campione da Phèdre "" di pace "e del Racine del Aristophanes". 
Le attività di valutazione di se stesso egualmente sono incluse
per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στο θέατρο, τις 
αρχές, την ανάπτυξη και τα βασικά ύφη του, συμπεριλαμβανομένων 
των ελληνικών και ρωμαϊκών παιχνιδιών, την αναγέννηση 
"Commedia dell'Arte"  και τα βασικά ύφη: 
τραγωδία, δράμα, και κωμωδία. Κείμενα δείγματα από 
Phθdre "" ειρήνης "και Racine Aristophanes". Οι 
δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την 
πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durchführen von von künsten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">genre littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exécution des arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genre literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">executando artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">genere letterario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia letteraria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">effettuazione delle arti</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνες εκτέλεσης</string>
          </keyword>
